text: In Uppsala, Sweden, Anders Celsius first used a Delisle thermometer he had marked up with 100 gradations between boiling and freezing. It was the first use of the centigrade scale of temperature.
Sony announced its first television set, the transistor-based TV-301. It would go on sale in Japan the following May.
Tim Berners-Lee with help from CERN computer scientist Robert Cailliau and others --  set up the first successful communication between a Web browser and server via the Internet.
